title: Memorial Wool Embroidery Design "Meinem Theuren Vater" and "Meiner Theuren Mater"
medium: Brush and gouache and watercolor, pen and black ink over etching on cream laid paper
description: Design for embroidery with distinctive slanted ribbon like components which contain the lettering. Additionally adorned with blue and pink flowers and buds. Drawn on a grid.
name: Drawing
